SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.fx

Class PropertyConverter

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.fx.PropertyConverter
public final class PropertyConverter extends Object
A utility class for converting properties between different types while maintaining synchronization between the original and converted properties. It provides methods to convert a property to a different type and to create read-only properties with conversions applied.

  • Method Details

    • convert

      public static <A, B, P extends javafx.beans.property.Property<@Nullable A>> javafx.beans.property.Property<B> convert(P property, Converter<@Nullable A,@Nullable B> converter)
      Converts a property of one type to another type using the provided converter, maintaining bidirectional synchronization between the original and converted properties.

      Note: both properties must not be bound!

      Type Parameters:
      A - the type of the original property's value
      B - the type of the converted property's value
      P - the type of Property containing the original value
      Parameters:
      property - the original property whose value is to be converted
      converter - a converter that defines how to convert the property's value from type A to type B and vice versa
      Returns:
      a new Property with a value of type B, synchronized with the original property

    • convertReadOnly

      public static <A, B, V extends javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<A>> javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyProperty<B> convertReadOnly(V value, Converter<A,B> converter)
      Converts a given read/write property of type A to a read-only property of type B using the specified converter. The conversion is automatically applied whenever the original property's value changes.
      Type Parameters:
      A - the type of the value held by the input property
      B - the type of the value to be held by the output read-only property
      V - the type of ObservableValue containing the original value
      Parameters:
      value - the property whose value is to be converted
      converter - the converter used to convert the property's value from type A to type B
      Returns:
      a read-only property containing the converted value of type B

    • convertReadOnly

      public static <A, B, V extends javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<A>> javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyProperty<B> convertReadOnly(V value, Function<A,B> converter)
      Converts a given read/write property of type A to a read-only property of type B using the specified converter. The conversion is automatically applied whenever the original property's value changes.
      Type Parameters:
      A - the type of the value held by the input property
      B - the type of the value to be held by the output read-only property
      V - the type of ObservableValue containing the original value
      Parameters:
      value - the property whose value is to be converted
      converter - the converter used to convert the property's value from type A to type B
      Returns:
      a read-only property containing the converted value of type B

    • convertToStringReadOnly

      public static <A, V extends javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<A>> javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyStringProperty convertToStringReadOnly(V value, Function<A,String> converter)
      Converts a given property of type A to a read-only property of type String using the specified converter. The conversion is automatically applied whenever the original property's value changes.
      Type Parameters:
      A - the type of the value held by the input property
      V - the type of ObservableValue containing the original value
      Parameters:
      value - the property whose value is to be converted
      converter - the converter used to convert the property's value from type A to type String
      Returns:
      a ReadOnlyStringProperty bound to the argument value

    • convertToDoubleReadOnly

      public static <A, V extends javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<A>> javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyDoubleProperty convertToDoubleReadOnly(V value, Function<A,Double> converter)
      Converts a given property of type A to a read-only property of type Double using the specified converter. The conversion is automatically applied whenever the original property's value changes.
      Type Parameters:
      A - the type of the value held by the input property
      V - the type of ObservableValue containing the original value
      Parameters:
      value - the property whose value is to be converted
      converter - the converter used to convert the property's value from type A to type String
      Returns:
      a ReadOnlyDoubleProperty bound to the argument value

    • convert

      public static javafx.beans.property.Property<Double> convert(javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty property)
      Converts a given DoubleProperty to a Property<Double> by performing a type-safe cast. This method addresses the type mismatch caused by the Java type system where DoubleProperty extends Property<Number> rather than Property<Double>.
      Parameters:
      property - the DoubleProperty to be converted
      Returns:
      the Property<Double> representation of the given DoubleProperty

    • convert

      public static javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty convert(javafx.beans.property.Property<Double> property)
      Converts a Property<Double> to a DoubleProperty.
      Parameters:
      property - the Property<Double> to be converted
      Returns:
      a DoubleProperty representation of the given Property<Double>
